troubleshooting_guidelines.overview: Essential guidance for troubleshooting common issues when implementing Carbon Design System components, with solutions and best practices.

systematic_approach.title: Systematic Problem Resolution
systematic_approach.description: When troubleshooting issues, follow the systematic problem resolution approach defined in 9_integration_best_practices.xml to identify and fix root causes in the correct order.
systematic_approach.reference: See 9_integration_best_practices.xml for detailed systematic problem resolution guidance

symptoms.symptom: Component is not visible in the UI

possible_causes.cause: Component not included in the component tree

solutions.solution: Ensure component is properly included in the component tree
Verify Grid and Column props for all breakpoints
Check for CSS conflicts in browser DevTools
Ensure each distinct section is in its own Grid

symptoms.symptom: Unable to navigate with Tab key
Focus not visible on interactive elements

possible_causes.cause: Custom components without proper keyboard support

solutions.solution: Use semantic HTML elements (button, a, input)

symptoms.symptom: Screen readers announce incorrect or missing information

solutions.solution: Provide alt text for images and iconDescription for icons

technique.name: Component Isolation
technique.description: Isolate problematic components to identify if issues are caused by the component itself or its context.

steps.step: Create a minimal test case with just the problematic component
Gradually add back context and props to identify what triggers the issue
Test the component with mock data to eliminate data-related issues

technique.name: React DevTools
technique.description: Use React DevTools to inspect component hierarchy, props, state, and performance.

steps.step: Use Components tab to inspect component tree and props
Use Profiler tab to identify performance bottlenecks

technique.name: Browser DevTools
technique.description: Use browser developer tools to inspect DOM, CSS, and network activity.

steps.step: Inspect element to check rendered DOM structure
Use Elements panel to debug CSS issues
Check Network panel for API calls and responses

measure.title: Component Testing
measure.description: Implement comprehensive testing to catch issues before they reach production.

implementation.step: Write unit tests for individual components
Create integration tests for component interactions
Include accessibility testing in your test suite

measure.title: Code Reviews
measure.description: Implement thorough code reviews with a focus on common Carbon implementation issues.

browser_validation.title: Browser Validation
browser_validation.description: Always validate Carbon implementations in the browser to catch visual and interactive issues.

checklist.item: Test at all responsive breakpoints (sm, md, lg)
Check that theme switching works correctly
Test with screen readers if possible

browser_validation.reference: See 6_browser_validation_subtask.xml for detailed browser validation guidance.
